articles.title: IPL 2020 not happening in India! BCCI official calls UAE, Sri Lanka front-runners for season 13 - Times Now
articles.description: A BCCI official has confirmed that IPL is unlikely to take place in India. UAE and Sri Lanka have emerged as front-runners to stage the tournament.

articles.title: ‘MS Dhoni wasn’t looking rusty, was batting for 200-250 balls’: Piyush Chawla on CSK camp - The Indian Express
articles.description: MS Dhoni was batting for 200-250 balls every day at the pre-IPL camp earlier this year and putting on a show of big shots, before the coronavirus pandemic led to the postonement of the event, said Piyush Chawla.

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Australia drops Dukes ball from Sheffield Shield with Ashes secured - The Guardian
articles.description: Cricket Australia has dropped the British-made Dukes ball from its 2020-21 Sheffield Shield season and will use only the Kookaburra to encourage more spin bowling on home pitches
articles.content:
